summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Broadview-Bitter Lake-Haller Lake Neighborhood Plan; amending the Seattle Comprehensive Plan to incorporate portions of the Broadview-Bitter Lake-Haller Lake Neighborhood Plan, and amending the Official Land Use Map, Title 23 of the Seattle Municipal Code, to reflect the boundaries of the Bitter Lake Village Hub Urban Village.
committee: Neighborhoods, Growth Planning and Civic Engagement
